## Zbior danych

```{r}

html_list <- htmltools::tagList()
html_list[[1]] <- data %>%
datatable(rownames = FALSE,
          class = 'cell-border stripe',
          options = list(
            dom = 't',
            pageLength = 11,
            autoWidth = TRUE,
            columnDefs = list(list(
              className = 'dt-left',
              targets = 0),
list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 1))))

html_list
```
